resources.string: Thank you for taking quiz in Techie quiz app

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What was Apple\'s first sales slogan?
How long after its April 3, 2010 release did Apple Stores sell their millionth iPad?
What ceremony was performed for Josh and Ting Li at an Apple Store in February 2010?
Which former U.S. presidential candidate sits on Apple\'s board of directors?
Which carrier is the exclusive provider for the iPhone?

string-array.name: options
string-array.item: An Apple A Day,Byte Into An Apple,No Worms In This Apple,One Great Apple
